Summary: Strange things going on near the sun.
divs: sighting detailswhat is happening on and around our sun? that is the question. it is now a hot spot for ufo's and also solar activity. all the while we here on earth are being hit by earth quakes and more. is all this connected. i believe the answers are clear. check out the information below. i hope this helps you understand what we are faced with. slushpup soho captures multiple ufo's march 11 2010 http:\\theufologynetwork.freeforum.ca\soho-captures-multiple-ufos-march-11-2010-vt429.html the sun goes crazy and forms a celtic knot march 10 2010 http:\\theufologynetwork.freeforum.ca\the-sun-goes-crazy-and-forms-a-celtic-knot-march-10-2010-vt428.html massive disturbance on the sun. mar 8 2010 http:\\theufologynetwork.freeforum.ca\massive-disturbance-on-the-sun-dot-mar-8-2010-vt402.html
